text: Steve Stevaert (; born Robert Stevaert ; April 12, 1954 â€“ April 2, 2015) was a Belgian politician of the Flemish Socialist Party: the SP.A. Stevaert was in 1995 also elected to the Flemish parliament and was re-elected in 1999 and 2004. Stevaert served as Flemish minister of Public Works, Transport and Spatial planning from 1998 to 1999 and as Flemish minister of Mobility, Transport and Public Works from 1999 to 2003, when he resigned having become chairman of his party, succeeding Patrick Janssens. He was chairman from 2003 until he resigned on May 25, 2005. In early April 2015 allegations of rape were made public in the Belgian media. Subsequently, on April 2, 2015, the public prosecutor of Hasselt confirmed that Stevaert had gone missing. Later that day, around 18:00 local time (CEST) divers found his body in the Albert Canal near Hasselt. ==References== ==Other websites== * Short biography of Stevaert at the website of the Flemish Parliament Category:1954 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Belgian mayors Category:Governors of Provinces of Belgium Category:People from Limburg (Belgium) Category:Politicians who committed suicide Category:Socialistische Partij Anders politicians Category:Suicides by drowning
